Text: How bout you download it and post one yourself tool....

No reviews?
Alright, I'll download it.
If it's good, and I remember it then I'll leave some feedback.

Maybe I'll upload my own ''Killing them softly'' since my connection is almost never down which means continuous(?) downloading for others. :D

Sound quality: 9
video quality: 6-7, slightly google video quality.  not widescreen, good to watch :)


/dave chapelle is amazing
looking forward to watch it. cheers mate

Must ask why you would upload your own version of a torrent rather than just seed a torrent that already exists?! If there were significant quality issues that would be different, but in most cases you can provide the same benefit from your high quality internet connection simply by seeding! After all, this is the whole concept behind torrents to begin with!

I don't know which torrent LBarto was commenting on  but
